title: - Patcher stopped working (SUPPORT)
body:
Greetings, 
The last time I launched LoL was about a month ago and everything worked fine. Now when I launch the game it gives me the following error:

PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working.

I've uninstalled the game and re-downloaded the patcher but it fails launching.
I tried to launch it as Adminstartor and with Windows XP Service Pack 3 but it still fails...

Any other possible solutions?
Thanks!

replies.body: This error usually results from a permissions issue that's blocking the patcher to run.  I suggest going through our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to configure your OS settings and allow access for the patcher to launch.  That should get you fixed up!
